item.title: Istio at scale: How eBay is building a massive multitenant service mesh using Istio
item.description: Managing a service mesh that spans hundreds of thousands of containers across the globe is no easy feat. At high scale, achieving fast configuration convergence time to thousands of proxies, while limiting the CPU & memory utilization of control-plane & proxies is a challenging problem. This talk describes eBay’s initial journey into building a scalable service mesh that provides the traffic management, load-balancing, security and observability features at scale leveraging Istio.
